price: 18 Dis-lui : “Ne veux-tu pas purifier ton âme de la souillure de l’impiété
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
